attributes.review: The app is just totally horrible, it’s very glitchy and took forever to download. Trump do better!  🤮

attributes.review: i downloaded the app so i could learn more about trump yet the app kept crashing and would not open. if you’re going to be president at least make your app work correctly, this is embarrassing
